ball.util

Class PropertiesImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable<Object,Object>
        • java.util.Properties
          • ball.util.PropertiesImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Map<Object,Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractObjectMapperConfiguration

    public class PropertiesImpl
extends Properties
    Properties implementation that overrides load(InputStream) and store(OutputStream,String) methods to specify the Charset (as UTF-8).
    Version:
    $Revision: 6199 $
    Author:
    Allen D. Ball
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
